text: Roger Baens (18 August 1933 – 28 March 2020) was a Belgian cyclist. He was born in Molenstede, Belgium. Baens competed with Mercier, Carpano, Libertas, Peugeot, Flandria, Philco, and Faemino–Faema. Baens died on 28 March 2020 in Rillaar, Belgium at the age of 87. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Belgian cyclists
title: Roger Baens
